ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: One of his followers in iman was Ibrahim
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And Abraham indeed was of his inducement,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Abraham was on the self-same way (as Noah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Abraham was one of his followers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed Ibrahim is from his (Nooh’s) group.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And verily, among those who followed his way was Ibrahim.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most surely Ibrahim followed his way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Of his party was also Abraham;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! of his persuasion verily was Abraham
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Abraham was of the same faith:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily of his sect was Ibrahim.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed Abraham was among his followers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily among those who followed his Way was Abraham.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And, verily, among those who followed his [Nuh's (Noah)] way (Islamic Monotheism) was Ibrahim (Abraham).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, among his kind was Abraham,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:83] And truly of his adherents, that is, of those who agreed with him on the fundaments of religion, was Abraham, despite the fact that there was a long interval between them, 2640 years, and between them came [the prophets] Hūd and Sālih.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 511 (And lo! of his persuasion) of Noah's persuasion; and it is also said this means: of Muhammad's persuasion (verily was Abraham) He says: Abraham followed the religion and way of Noah and Muhammad (pbuh) followed Abraham's religion and way.
